summary_md: Greece, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita (21,654 USD per person) and an inflation rate (2.74%). The unemployment rate (10.13%) and life expectancy (81.54 years) are also recorded, alongside internet usage (85.00%) and export growth (41.98%).

sections.economy_md: The GDP per capita (21,654 USD per person) and export growth (41.98%) indicate the economic status, while the inflation rate (2.74%) reflects the cost of living adjustments.
sections.labor_md: With an unemployment rate (10.13%), the labor market dynamics are crucial for understanding the job opportunities and challenges in Greece.
sections.digital_md: Internet usage (85.00%) suggests the level of digital connectivity and potential for digital entrepreneurship in the country.
sections.health_env_md: Life expectancy (81.54 years) provides insight into the health environment and quality of life for residents.
